書名: 臺灣閩南語囡仔歌輯錄

段: 戽蝦仔，戽蝦仔，戽虼蚤，戽三升，五米斗。
Hou5 he5-a2, hou5 he5-a2, hou5 ka-chau2, hou5 sann seng, gou7 bi2-tau2.
祈禱，祈禱，一尾虱目仔魚，予貓咬去無地討。
Ki5-to2, ki5-to2, chit8 boe2 sat-bak8-a2-hi5, hou7 niau ka7 khi3 bo5 te3 tho2.
金蛄金蛄頭趄趄，覕佇樹頂[疒@去]痀。金蛄金蛄，細粒頭，圓身軀。
Kim-ku kim-ku thau5 chhu-chhu, bih ti7 chhiu7-teng2 teh he-ku. Kim-ku kim-ku, se3-liap8 thau5, inn5 sin-khu.
乖查某囝！乖查某囝！呣通吼，新眠床，咿喂吼，新棉被，無虼蚤，新枕頭，無油垢，呰陣若呣嫁，呣通後日罩帕仔巾，逮人走。

Koai cha-bou2-kiann2! Koai cha-bou2-kiann2! M7-thang hau2, sin bin5-chhng5, i-oe hau2, sin mi7-phoe7, bo5 ka-chau2, sin chim2-thau5, bo5 iu5-kau2, chit-chun7 na7 m7 ke3, m7-thang au7-jit8 ta3 phann3-a2-kin, toe3 lang5 chau2.
客婆仔[尸@之]，放尿黏黐黐，沃蒜仔大枝，沃韭菜連鞭死。
Kheh-po5-a2 chi, pang3-jio7 liam5-thi-thi, ak soan3-a2 be7 toa7 ki, ak ku2-chhai3 liam-mi si2.
指甲花，笑微微，笑我陳三無了時，有轎放來坐，有馬放來騎，馬頭向上山，馬尾掛金鞍，金鞍行恁姊也做親情，做幾時？做月半，銀針掛銀線，針線籠，搖三板，三板花，搖幾蕊？搖三蕊，一蕊下落井，一蕊下落田，叫姑抾，姑呣抾，叫嫂抾，嫂呣抾，老婆仔抾起來，姑也愛，嫂也愛，老婆仔去後花園偷剝芥菜，剝幾笚？剝兩笚，秀才騎馬踉踉來，一笚送童生，一笚送秀才，閹雞股，掠來刣。

Cheng2-kah-hoe, chhio3-bi5-bi5, chhio3 goa2 Tan5 Sann bo5 liau2-si5, u7 kio7 pang3 lai5 che7, u7 be2 pang3 lai5 khia5, be2-thau5 hiong3 chiunn7 soann, be2-boe2 koa3 kim-oann, kim-oann kiann5 kau3 lin2 chi2--a2 cho3 chhin-chiann5, cho3 kui2-si5? Cho3 goeh8-poann3, gin5-chiam koa3 gin5-soann3, chiam-soann3 lang2, io5 sam-pan2, sam-pan2-hoe, io5 kui2 lui2? Io5 sann lui2, chit8 lui2 he7 loh8 chenn2, chit8 lui2 he7 loh8 chhan5, kio3 kou khioh, kou m7 khioh, kio3 so2 khioh, so2 m7 khioh, lau7-po5--a2 khioh--khi2-lai5, kou ia7 ai3, so2 ia7 ai3, lau7-po5--a2 khi3 au7-hoe-hng5 thau peh koah-chhai3, peh kui2 hah8? Peh nng7 hah8, siu3-chai5 khia5-be2 long7-long7 lai5, chit8 hah8 sang3 tong5-seng, chit8 hah8 sang3 siu3-chai5, iam-ke-kou2, liah8 lai5 thai5.
指指[手+突][手+突]，墜腸泛phuh8。
Chi2-chi2 tuh8-tuh8, tui7 tng5 ham3-phuh8.
指指[手+突][手+突]，大頭假仙泛皮phuh8。
Chi2-chi2 tuh8-tuh8, toa7-thau5 ke2-sian ham3-phoe5-phuh8.
查某囝呣通哭，新眠床咿哦吼，新蠓罩無虼蚤，新枕頭無油垢，呰陣若呣嫁，呣通後日逮人走。
Cha-bou2-kiann2 m7-thang khau3, sin bin5-chhng5 inn-onn hau2, sin bang2-ta3 bo5 ka-chau2, sin chim2-thau5 bo5 iu5-kau2, chit-chun7 na7 m7 ke3, m7-thang au7-jit8 toe3 lang5 chau2.
查某囡仔，查某囡仔汝幾歲，新娘車，駛倒退，轂著恁母仔真痞勢，阿母仔，阿母仔，我無愛嫁，我卜留咧嫁皇帝。
Cha-bou2 gin2-a2, cha-bou2 gin2-a2 li2 kui2 hoe3, sin-niu5-chhia, sai2 to3-the3, kauh tioh8 lin2 bu2--a2 chin phainn2-se3, a-bu2--a2, a-bu2--a2, goa2 bo5-ai3 ke3, goa2 beh lau5 leh ke3 hong5-te3.
查某囡仔逸陶揭雨傘，拄著一陣烏貓倌，較媠的查某囡仔分阮看，阮呰陣就是大鱸鰻。激龜的無殼，激鹿的無角，痞命阿哥即夠角，骹底反起來予日曝。

Cha-bou2 gin2-a2 chhit-tho5 gia5 hou7-soann3, tu2 tioh8 chit8 tin7 ou-niau-koann, khah sui2 e5 cha-bou2 gin2-a2 pun goan2 khoann3, goan2 chit-chun7 to7 si7 toa7-lou5-moa5. kek ku--e5 bo5 khak, kek lok8--e5 bo5 kak, phainn2-mia7 a-ko chiah kau3 kak, kha-te2 peng2 khi2 lai5 hou7 jit8 phak8.
查某囡仔汝幾歲，呣知嫁翁抑是未，汝無嫁我無娶，咱兩人拄好大。嫣頭囡仔汝幾歲，呣知娶某抑是未，汝無娶我無嫁，咱兩人拄好大。

Cha-bou2 gin2-a2 li2 kui2 hoe3, m7 chai ke3-ang iah si7 boe7, li2 bo5 ke3 goa2 bo5 chhoa7, lan2 nng7 lang5 tu2-ho2 toa7. Ian5-tau5 gin2-a2 li2 kui2 hoe3, m7 chai chhoa7-bou2 iah si7 boe7, li2 bo5 chhoa7 goa2 bo5 ke3, lan2 nng7 lang5 tu2-ho2 toa7.
查某倌，汝那即爾早，啊我就透暝行，啊汝佇佗啊，啊我蹛塗城，啊汝那即爾媠，啊我就爸母生成，啊汝喙齒那即烏，啊我敢食呣驚苦，啊汝骹那即細，我就從細呣畏疼。

Cha-bou2-koann, li2 nah chiah-ni7 cha2, ah goa2 to7 thau3-me5 kiann5, ah li2 ti7 toh ah, ah goa2 toa3 thou5-siann5, ah li2 nah chiah-ni7 sui2, ah goa2 to7 pe7-bu2 senn-seng5, ah li2 chhui3-khi2 nah chiah ou, ah goa2 kann2 chiah8 m7 kiann khou2, ah li2 kha nah chiah se3, goa2 to7 cheng7 se3 m7 ui3 thiann3.
拜月娘，拜月姊好頭毛，好喙齒，大是兄，細是弟，汝呣通舁刀仔，割我雙爿耳。
Pai3 goeh8-niu5, pai3 goeh8-che2 ho2 thau5-mou, ho2 chhui3-khi2, toa7 si7 hiann, se3 si7 te7, li2 m7-thang gia5 to-a2, koah goa2 siang-peng5 hinn7.
扁擔神，長噒噒，因何那有神？
Pinn2-tann-sin5, tng5-lin3-lin3, in ho5 nah u7 sin5?
紅絳獅，白目眉，無人請，家己來。
Ang5-kang3-sai, peh8 bak8-bai5, bo5 lang5 chhiann2, ka-ti7 lai5.
食人匏仔水冷心肝，阿姊嫁後山，後山人卜刣，嫁秀才，秀才卜考舉，嫁鳥鼠，鳥鼠卜挖空，嫁相公，相公卜徛旗，嫁蟾蜍，蟾蜍卜咬蠓，嫁骹桶，骹桶卜貯水，嫁予一个賣田鬼，賣田鬼的卜賣鴨，嫁予一个老公仔，哈哈哈。

Chiah8 lang5 pu5-a2-chui2 leng2 sim-koann, a-chi2 ke3 au7-soann, au7-soann lang5 beh thai5, ke3 siu3-chai5, siu3-chai5 beh kho2 ki2, ke3 niau2-chhi2, niau2-chhi2 beh ou2 khang, ke3 siong3-kong, siong3-kong beh khia7 ki5, ke3 chiunn5-chi5, chiunn5-chi5 beh ka7 bang2, ke3 kha-thang2, kha-thang2 beh te2 chui2, ke3 hou7 chit8 e5 be7-chhan5-kui2, be7-chhan5-kui2 e5 beh be7 ah, ke3 hou7 chit8 e5 lau7-kong--a2, ha ha ha.
食果子，上歡喜，食傷濟，無代誌。食菝仔，放銃子；食柚仔，放蝦米；食荔枝，放木耳；狗仔囝，上歡喜。

Chiah8 koe2-chi2, siong7 hoann-hi2, chiah8 siunn che7, bo5 tai7-chi3. Chiah8 poat8-a2, pang3 chheng3-chi2; chiah8 iu7-a2, pang3 he5-bi2; chiah8 nai7-chi, pang3 bok8-ni2; kau2-a2-kiann2, siong7 hoann-hi2.
後母仔[尸@之]，放尿黏黐黐，牽偌長，牽甘蔗園，牽徦韌韌韌，挈刀割斷。
Au7-bu2-a2 chi, pang3-jio7 liam5-thi-thi, khan joa7 tng5, khan kau3 kam-chia3-hng5, khan kah jun7-jun7-jun7, theh8 to koah be7 tng7.
後壁一个鼓，斡頭看恁某，後壁一叢蔥，斡頭看恁尪。
Au7-piah chit8 e5 kou2, oat8-thau5 khoann3 lin2 bou2, au7-piah chit8 chang5 chhang, oat8-thau5 khoann3 lin2 ang.
紅田蠳，紅吱吱，騎牛騎馬來培墓，大兄排紅龜，二兄排牲醴，三兄燒香和點火，飼牛囡仔圍來挹墓粿，墓粿分無夠，豆乾鴨卵挈來搭。

Ang5 chhan5-enn, ang5-ki-ki, khia5 gu5 khia5 be2 lai5 poe5-bong7, toa7-hiann pai5 ang5-ku, ji7-hiann pai5 seng-le2, sann-hiann sio-hiunn kap tiam2-hoe2, chhi7-gu5 gin2-a2 ui5 lai5 iap bong7-koe2, bong7-koe2 pun bo5-kau3, tau7-koann ah-nng7 theh8 lai5 tau3.
紅田蠳，紅絳絳，騎牛騎馬來培墓，大兄排紅龜，二兄排牲醴，三兄燒香和點火，飼牛囡仔圍來分墓粿，墓粿分無夠，豆乾鴨卵佫挈來搭。

Ang5 chhan5-enn, ang5-kong3-kong3, khia5 gu5 khia5 be2 lai5 poe5-bong7, toa7-hiann pai5 ang5-ku, ji7-hiann pai5 seng-le2, sann-hiann sio-hiunn kap tiam2-hoe2, chhi7-gu5 gin2-a2 ui5 lai5 pun bong7-koe2, bong7-koe2 pun bo5-kau3, tau7-koann ah-nng7 koh theh8 lai5 tau3.
紅柑殼，塞佇涵空角。
Ang5-kam khak, that ti7 am5-khang kak.
紅柿，紅柿，乞食恁小弟。
Ang5-khi7, ang5-khi7, khit-chiah8 lin2 sio2-ti7.
韭菜花，韭菜籽，煮落芳芳芳，兄呀兄，嫂呀嫂，十七十八卜嫁翁。嫁佗位？嫁錢哩，錢上揚，繡裙十六幅，繡鞋十六雙，繡鴛鴦，繡雞公，

Ku2-chhai3-hoe, ku2-chhai3-chi2, chu2--loh8 phang-phang-phang, hiann ah hiann, so2 ah so2, chap8-chhit chap8-peh beh ke3-ang. ke3 toh-ui7? Ke3 chinn5 lih8, chinn5 siong7 iang7, siu3-kun5 chap8-lak8 pak, siu3-e5 chap8-lak8 siang, siu3 oan-iunn, siu3 ke-kang,
做人的雞公早早啼，做人的新婦早早起，入大廳，拭桌椅，入灶骹，洗碗箸，入繡房，做針黹，謳咾兄，謳咾弟，謳咾親家親姆[敖^力]教示。

Cho3 lang5 e5 ke-kang cha2-cha2 thi5, cho3 lang5 e5 sin-pu7 cha2-cha2 khi2, jip8 toa7-thiann, chhit toh-i2, jip8 chau3-kha, se2 oann2-ti7, jip8 siu3-pang5, cho3 chiam-chi2, o-lo2 hiann, o-lo2 ti7, o-lo2 chhin-ke chhinn-m2 gau5 ka3-si7.
風若透，檨仔就；風若吹，檨仔就斷椏。
Hong na7 thau3, soainn7-a2 to7 kau3; hong na7 chhoe, soainn7-a2 to7 tng7-oe.
風緊來，一鮮予汝買鳳梨；風緊去，一鮮予汝買茭織。
Hong kin2 lai5, chit8 sian2 hou7 li2 be2 ong5-lai5; hong kin2 khi3, chit8 sian2 hou7 li2 be2 ka-chi3.
唏噓挨，篩米篩粟飼閹雞。飼雞通叫更，飼狗通吠暝；飼後生，養老歲。飼查某囝，別人的。
Hi-hu7-e, thai bi2 thai chhek chhi7 iam-ke. chhi7 ke thang kio3-kenn, chhi7 kau2 thang pui7-me5; chhi7 hau7-senn, iong2 lau7-hoe3. chhi7 cha-bou2-kiann2, pat8-lang5 e5.
唏噓挨，篩米來飼雞。飼雞通報更，飼狗通吠暝；飼外甥，去呣來。飼新婦，養大家。飼查某囝，別人的。
Hi-hu7-e, thai bi2 lai5 chhi7 ke. Chhi7 ke thang po3-kenn, chhi7 kau2 thang pui7-me5; chhi7 goe7-seng, khi3 m7 lai5. Chhi7 sin-pu7, iong2 ta-ke. Chhi7 cha-bou2-kiann2, pat8-lang5 e5.
唏噓挨，篩米飼閹雞。閹雞飼大隻，刣予阿舅食，阿舅食無了，偆一个雞骹爪，阿媽捀去囥，我孫桌骹蟯蟯鑽。

Hi-hu7-e, thai bi2 chhi7 iam-ke. Iam-ke chhi7 toa7-chiah, thai5 hou7 a-ku7 chiah8, a-ku7 chiah8 bo5 liau2, chhun chit8 e5 ke-kha-jiau2, a-ma2 phang5 khi3 khng3, goa2 sun toh-kha ngiauh8-ngiauh8-chng3.
唏噓挨，載米載粟來飼雞，飼大隻講[敖^力]叫更，飼細隻講[敖^力]吠暝，飼後生，養老爸，飼查某囝，是別人的，看人來，順紲舁椅仔予人坐。

Hi-hu7-e, chai3 bi2 chai3 chhek lai5 chhi7 ke, chhi7 toa7-chiah kong2 gau5 kio3-kenn, chhi7 se3 chiah kong2 gau5 pui7-me5, chhi7 hau7-senn, iong2 lau7-pe7, chhi7 cha-bou2-kiann2, si7 pat8-lang5 e5, khoann3 lang5 lai5, sun7-soa3 gia5 i2-a2 hou7 lang5 che7.
唏噓挨，篩米篩粟來飼雞，飼雞卜叫更，飼狗卜守暝，飼後生，卜有孝老爸，飼新婦，卜有孝大家，飼查某囝，別人的，飼大豬通來刣，飼外孫攏呣來。

Hi-hu7-e, thai bi2 thai chhek lai5 chhi7 ke, chhi7 ke beh kio3-kenn, chhi7 kau2 beh chiu2-me5, chhi7 hau7-senn, beh iu2-hau3 lau7-pe7, chhi7 sin-pu7, beh iu2-hau3 ta-ke, chhi7 cha-bou2-kiann2, pat8-lang5 e5, chhi7 toa7-ti thang lai5 thai5, chhi7 goa7-sun long2 m7 lai5.
挨粿歌：石磨挨粿愛兩人，查甫挨磨較粗重。查某舀米落磨空，做甜粿，[臼@米]佫芳。
E-koe2-koa: Chioh8-boa5 e koe2 ai3 nng7 lang5, cha-pou e boa5 khah chhou-tang7. Cha-bou2 iunn2 bi2 loh8 boa5-khang, cho3 tinn-koe2, khiu5 koh phang.
挨啊挨，糴米糴粟來飼雞。飼雞卜叫更，飼狗卜吠暝；飼後生，養老歲。飼查某囝，別人的。
E ah e, tiah8 bi2 tiah8 chhek lai5 chhi7 ke. Chhi7 ke beh kio3-kenn, chhi7 kau2 beh pui7-me5; chhi7 hau7-senn, iong2 lau7-hoe3. Chhi7 cha-bou2-kiann2, pat8-lang5 e5.
挨呀挨唏噓，刣雞請阿舅，阿舅食無了，偆一个雞骹雞後爪，阿媽捀去囥，孫仔四界鑽，阿媽捀去曝，孫仔四界搦，阿媽捀去架，孫仔四界[手+罪]。

E ah e-hi-hu7, thai5 ke chhiann2 a-ku7, a-ku7 chiah8 bo5 liau2, chhun chit8 e5 ke-kha ke-au7-jiau2, a-ma2 phang5 khi3 khng3, sun-a2 si3-ke3 nng3, a-ma2 phang5 khi3 phak8, sun-a2 si3-ke3 lak8, a-ma2 phang5 khi3 khoe3, sun-a2 si3-ke3 chhoe7.
挨啊挨噓噓，刣雞請阿舅，阿舅食無了，偆一枝雞骹雞後爪，予嬰仔舁椅仔掛骹，偷食了了。
E ah e-hu7-hu7, thai5 ke chhiann2 a-ku7, a-ku7 chiah8 bo5 liau2, chhun chit8 ki ke-kha ke-au7-jiau2, hou7 enn-a2 gia5 i2-a2 khue3-kha, thau-chiah8 liau2-liau2.
挨噓挨，挨米飼閹雞，閹雞飼大隻，刣予阿舅也食，阿舅食無了，偆一枝雞骹爪，阿媽捀去囥，阿孫兮桌骹矻矻鑽，鑽無食，柝頭額。

E-hu7-e, e-bi2 chhi7 iam-ke, iam-ke chhi7 toa7-chiah, thai5 hou7 a-ku7--a2 chiah8, a-ku7 chiah8 bo5 liau2, chhun chit8 ki ke-kha-jiau2, a-ma2 phang5 khi3 khng3, a-sun--e5 toh-kha khok-khok nng3, nng3 bo5 chiah8, khok thau5-hiah8.
挨噓噓，刣雞請阿舅，阿舅食無了，偆一枝雞骹爪，阿媽捀去囥，嬰仔桌骹矻矻鑽，鑽卜食，挵著頭殼額。
E-hu7-hu7, thai5 ke chhiann2 a-ku7, a-ku7 chiah8 bo5 liau2, chhun chit8 ki ke-kha-jiau2, a-ma2 phang5 khi3 khng3, enn-a2 toh-kha khok-khok nng3, nng3 beh chiah8, long3 tioh8 thau5-khak-hiah8.
挨囉挨，豬槽駛過溪，溪也深，海也深，海底徛觀音，觀音城生狗仔囝，生幾隻？生三隻，寄啥人賣？寄公也賣，賣幾錢？賣三个錢，糴紅米，挲紅圓，食飽飽，上西天，跋落來，扁扁扁，抾六个錢，娶六个某，一个嫁漳州，一个嫁泉州，一个看牛，一个看虎，一个生囡仔，一个大腹肚。

E loh e, ti-cho5 sai2 koe3 khe, khe ia2 chhim, hai2 ia7 chhim, hai2-te2 khia7 Koan-im, Koan-im siann5 senn kau2-a2-kiann2, senn kui2 chiah? Senn sann chiah, kia3 siann2-lang5 be7? Kia3 kong--a2 be7, be7 kui2 chinn5? Be7 sann e5 chinn5, tiah8 ang5-bi2, so ang5-inn5, chiah8 pa2-pa2, peh chiunn7 se-thian, poah8--loh8-lai5, pinn2-pinn2-pinn2, khioh lak8 e5 chinn5, chhoa7 lak8 e5 bou2, chit8 e5 ke3 Chiong-chiu, chit8 e5 ke3 Choann5-chiu, chit8 e5 khoann3 gu5, chit8 e5 khoann3 hou2, chit8 e5 senn gin2-a2, chit8 e5 toa7-pak-tou2.
挨囉挨，載粟載米飼閹雞，閹雞呴呴啼，令兄娶令姨，令姨[敖^力]繡花，繡去三針乒乓磅，滬尾去唐山，唐山查婦[敖^力]打扮，打扮二月卜做官，卜去，包袱仔稱雨傘，卜轉去，白馬掛金鞍。

E loh e, chai3 chhek chai3 bi2 chhi7 iam-ke, iam-ke ku-ku thi5, leng7-hiann chhoa7 leng7-i5, leng7-i5 gau5 siu3-hoe, siu3 khi3 sann chiam phin5-phong2-pong3, Hou7-boe2 khi3 Tng5-soann, Tng5-soann chha5-hu7 gau5 tann2-pan7, tann2-pan7 ji7--goeh8 beh cho3-koann, beh khi3, pau-hok-a2 thin7 hou7-soann3, beh tng2--khi3, peh8-be2 koa3 kim-oann.
臭頭一枝刺，大港三棚戲。無錢呣敢去；去大廟口，食人一碗麵；碗共人咬一缺，無錢食卜予人嬖。

Chhau3-thau5 chit8 ki chhi3, toa7-kang2 sann penn5 hi3. Bo5 chinn5 m7 kann2 khi3; khi3 kau3 toa7-bio7-khau2, chiah8 lang5 chit8 oann2 mi7; oann2 ka7 lang5 ka7 chit8 khih, bo5 chinn5 chiah8 beh hou7 lang5 phi3.
臭頭一枝刺，大港咧做戲。無錢也敢去；去大廟口，食人一碗麵；共碗咬一缺，無錢食卜予人嬖。

Chhau3-thau5 chit8 ki chhi3, toa7-kang2 leh cho3-hi3. Bo5 chinn5 ia7 kann2 khi3; khi3 kau3 toa7-bio7-khau2, chiah8 lang5 chit8 oann2 mi7; ka7 oann2 ka7 chit8 khih, bo5 chinn5 chiah8 beh hou7 lang5 phi3.
臭頭兮臭疕疤，食飽鑽橋骹，橋骹潛牡蠣，掠臭頭兮來剝皮，皮撐鼓，肉飼虎，虎頭來煮薑，虎尾來燒香，薑辣辣，臭頭仔囝飼活。

Chhau3-thau5--e5 chhau3 phi2-pa, chiah8-pa2 nng3 kio5-kha, kio5-kha chhang3 bou2-le7, liah8 chhau3-thau5--e5 lai5 pak-phoe5, phoe5 keng kou2, bah chhi7 hou2, hou2-thau5 lai5 chu2-kiunn, hou2-boe2 lai5 sio-hiunn, kiunn hiam-hiam, chhau3-thau5-a2-kiann2 chhi7 be7 oah8.
臭頭臭穢穢，上山抾柴[竹^拜]，柴[竹^拜]無人買，臭頭兮死娘嬭，娘嬭無教示，臭頭死兄弟，兄弟無博筊，臭頭兮死了了。

Chhau3-thau5 chhau3-oe3-oe3, chiunn7 soann khioh chha5-phoe3, chha5-phoe3 bo5 lang5 be2, chhau3-thau5--e5 si2 niu5-le2, niu5-le2 bo5 ka3-si7, chhau3-thau5 si2 hiann-ti7, hiann-ti7 bo5 poah8-kiau2, chhau3-thau5--e5 si2 liau2-liau2.
臭頭琉璃燈，摃破鴨卵清，流流一胛脊，粗紙一直拆，拆去兩三刀，臭頭[火+冘]米糕，米糕無參糖，臭頭發毛。

Chhau3-thau5 liu5-li5-teng, kong3 phoa3 ah-nng7 chheng, lau5-lau5 chit8 kah-chiah, chhou-choa2 it-tit8 thiah, thiah khi3 nng7 sann to, chhau3-thau5 tim5 bi2-ko, bi2-ko bo5 chham thng5, chhau3-thau5 be7 hoat-mng5.
臭頭琉璃燈，捾去媽祖宮；媽祖無閒，捾去觀音亭；觀音媽面笑笑，捾去大眾廟；大眾爺面烏烏，捾去教場埔；教場埔一堆青，捾去竹仔坑；竹仔長長，捾去蕃薯園；蕃薯臭臭，捾去海口食下晝。

Chhau3-thau5 liu5-li5-teng, koann7 khi3 Ma2-chou2-keng; Ma2-chou2 teh bo5-eng5, koann7 khi3 Koan-im-teng5; Koan-im-ma2 bin7 chhio3-chhio3, koann7 khi3 Tai7-chiong3-bio7; Tai7-chiong3-ia5 bin7 ou-ou, koann7 khi3 kau3-tiunn5-pou; kau3-tiunn5-pou chit8 tui chhenn, koann7 khi3 tek-a2-khenn; tek-a2 tng5-tng5, koann7 khi3 han-chi5-hng5; han-chi5 chhau3-chhau3, koann7 khi3 hai2-khau2 chiah8 e7-tau3.
臭頭琉璃燈，捾去媽祖宮；媽祖無閒，捾去觀音亭；觀音媽面笑笑，捾去大眾廟；大眾爺面烏烏，捾去教場埔；教場埔一堆骨，捾去竹仔窟；竹仔長長，捾去蕃薯園；蕃薯臭臭，捾去海口食下晝。

Chhau3-thau5 liu5-li5-teng, koann7 khi3 Ma2-chou2-keng; Ma2-chou2 teh bo5-eng5, koann7 khi3 Koan-im-teng5; Koan-im-ma2 bin7 chhio3-chhio3, koann7 khi3 Tai7-chiong3-bio7; Tai7-chiong3-ia5 bin7 ou-ou, koann7 khi3 kau3-tiunn5-pou; kau3-tiunn5-pou chit8 tui kut, koann7 khi3 tek-a2-khut; tek-a2 tng5-tng5, koann7 khi3 han-chi5-hng5; han-chi5 chhau3-chhau3, koann7 khi3 hai2-khau2 chiah8 e7-tau3.
烏呀嗚，渡船倚砂埔，砂埔冷冷，稱換戥。戥無花，肚匏換莿瓜，莿瓜金子，我拍你，你不肯，荔枝換福眼；福眼劈開全全肉，雞拍鴨，鴨肉粗粗粗，小弟拍阿兄；阿兄無本事，師仔拍師父，師父手骨激短短，老戲拍傀儡；傀儡穿長靴，百姓拍老爹，老爹喝去掠，鱸鰻拍乞食。

Ou ah ouh, tou7-chun5 oa2 soa-pou, soa-pou leng2-leng2, chhin3 oann7 teng2. teng2 bo5 hoe, tou7-pu5 oann7 chhi3-koe, chhi3-koe kim-chi2, goa2 phah li2, li2 m7 kheng2, nai7-chi oann7 geng5-geng2; geng5-geng2 phoa3 khui choan5-choan5 bah, ke phah ah, ah-bah chhou-chhou-chhou, sio2-ti7 phah a-hiann; a-hiann bo5 pun2-su7, sai-a2 phah sai-hu7, sai-hu7 chhiu2-kut kek te2-te2, lau7-hi3 phah ka-le2; ka-le2 chheng7 tng5-hia, peh-senn3 phah lau7-tia, lau7-tia hoah khi3 liah8, lou5-moa5 phah khit-chiah8.
烏鴉烏，渡船倚砂埔，砂埔冷冷，秤換戥，戥無花，肚匏換莿瓜，莿瓜全籽，我扑汝，汝呣肯，荔枝換福眼，福眼擘開全全肉，雞扑鴨，鴨肉粗粗粗，小弟扑阿兄，阿兄無本事，司仔扑司傅，司傅手骨激垛垛，老戲扑傀儡，傀儡穿長靴，百姓扑老爹，老爹喝去掠，鱸鰻扑乞食。

Ou-a ou, tou7-chun5 oa2 soa-pou, soa-pou leng2-leng2, pong7 oann7 teng2, teng2 bo5 hoe, tou7-pu5 oann7 chhi3-koe, chhi3-koe choan5 chi2, goa2 phah li2, li2 m7 kheng2, nai7-chi oann7 geng5-geng2, geng5-geng2 peh khui choan5-choan5 bah, ke phah ah, ah-bah chhou-chhou-chhou, sio2-ti7 phah a-hiann, a-hiann bo5 pun2-su7, sai-a2 phah sai-hu7, sai-hu7 chhiu2-kut kek te2 te2, lau7-hi3 phah ka-le2, ka-le2 chheng7 tng5-hia, peh-senn3 phah lau7-tia, lau7-tia hoah khi3 liah8, lou5-moa5 phah khit-chiah8.
烏面祖師公，白目眉，無人共汝請，家己來，一个面仔是笑咳咳，笑徦一个喙仔裂腮腮，到底笑啥代？舁椅頭仔看目眉，椅頭仔踏無好，跋落來。

Ou-bin7 Chou2-su-kong, peh8 bak8-bai5, bo5 lang5 ka7 li2 chhiann2, ka-ti7 lai5, chit8 e5 bin7-a2 si7 chhio3-hai-hai, chhio3 kah chit8 e5 chhui3-a2 li7-sai-sai, tau3-te2 chhio3 siann2-tai7? Gia5 i2-thau5-a2 khoann3 bak8-bai5, i2-thau5-a2 tah8 bo5 ho2, poah8--loh8-lai5.
